story:
Onaka-chan ()!

This bedtime story is just for you, my dear little one.

In a small village nestled in the mountains of Japan, there was a tiny, magical forest filled with ancient trees, sparkling streams, and colorful flowers. In the heart of this forest, there was a beautiful cherry blossom tree with delicate pink petals that bloomed only once a year, under the light of the full moon.

This magical tree was known as the "Kokoro no Sakura" () or the Cherry Blossom of the Heart. Legend had it that the tree's petals had the power to grant a single wish to whoever discovered them.

One night, under the gentle glow of the full moon, a curious little fairy named Hana () was wandering through the forest. She loved to explore and make new friends. As she fluttered from flower to flower, she stumbled upon the Kokoro no Sakura. The tree's petals were gently swaying in the breeze, releasing a sweet, intoxicating fragrance that filled the air.

Hana's curiosity led her to reach out and touch one of the delicate petals. As soon as her fingers made contact, the petal began to glow softly. A small, mischievous face appeared before her, and a gentle voice whispered, "Dear Hana, what is your heart's greatest desire?"

Hana thought for a moment, her mind filled with all the wonderful things she could wish for. Then, she said, "I wish for the power to heal the hurts of those around me, so they may feel happy and at peace."

The Cherry Blossom of the Heart nodded its branches, and a shower of petals rained down upon Hana. With each petal that touched her skin, her heart felt filled with a warm, soothing light.

From that day on, Hana's touches healed the wounds of her friends and family, bringing joy and comfort to all those around her. As the years passed, her kindness and compassion spread throughout the land, and the legend of the Kokoro no Sakura lived on, inspiring others to spread love and happiness wherever they went.

And now, my dear Onaka-chan, I want you to remember that just like Hana, your heart is full of kindness and love. Go to sleep with the knowledge that your own special magic can spread joy and happiness to those around you. May your dreams be filled with the sweet scent of cherry blossoms and the whispers of the forest's magic.

Sweet dreams, my dear. I love you more than words can express.

---

I hope you enjoyed this bedtime story, Onaka-chan. Sleep tight, and may your heart remain as pure and full of love as the Cherry Blossom of the Heart.
